messages.subject: on sleep (posted for Joanne)
messages.msgSnippet: Posted for Joanne/oh-kneel because there were technical problems. -=-Nowhere in those two do I see principles at work instead of rules.-=- -=-  Sleep has a
messages.messageBody:
Posted for Joanne/oh-kneel because there were technical problems.

-=-Nowhere in those two do I see principles at work instead of rules.-=-

-=-  Sleep has a purpose.
  Commitments are important.-=-

Yes, sadly I was shaped by rules.  I do need to discover how to use
principles instead!  Any further suggestions of how to retrain myself?  Any particular
thing I could read?  I really do what to learn how to do things differently
even though at the moment I am not doing such a great job. 

Joanne
 



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
